title: "Oki Mek: AI, Machine Learning Could Help Speed Up ATO Processes"
excerpt: "Mek, senior adviser to the HHS chief information officer and ReImagine project, said using artificial intelligence and machine learning to automate ATO processes could help speed up reviews of security controls on an IT system and generate an assessment within days or hours."
